reviews.negative_text: Nous avons eu un souci de nuisance sonore dans la chambre 502 (chambre double privilège), dans laquelle on entend la climatisation générale de l'hôtel. Elle s'arrête la nuit mais reprend assez tôt le matin et il est impossible de dormir lorsqu'elle est en route car elle est très bruyante. L'hôtel a fait un petit geste commercial sur le petit déjeuner, que nous avons apprécié, mais de telles chambres ne devraient pas exister dans un hôtel 4 étoiles.

reviews.review_title: Ne vous attendez pas à du service, passez à la caisse selon les règles de la maison
reviews.positive_text: Positionnement de l'établissement. Produit 4*
reviews.negative_text: Un vrai 4* , sauf que le produit ne fait pas tout … Demander un transfert de la gare à l’hôtel (arrivée tardive), n’est pas possible si vous passez par Booking.Com. La responsable vous explique que vous devez contacter l’établissement directement ou LIRE vos mails pour un suivi au niveau de l’hôtel.  Régler votre séjour en espèces est suspect.  Selon les règles de la maison ce n’est pas possible. La personne en charge de l’accueil la nuit n’a aucune marge de manœuvre et n’a pas droit au sens du discernement, elle est tenue d’exiger le règlement par carte bancaire à l’avance ou si vous persistez à vouloir régler en espèces, vous devez vous acquitter de plus de 2 fois le prix de la nuit parce que vous allez vider le minibar et abîmer le mobilier. De plus, si vous vous conformez à cette règle, vous n’avez à aucun moment la garantie que le trop-perçu par l’établissement vous sera remboursé.  Ecrire votre mécontentement sur le « livre d’or » de l’établissement est inconcevable pour la responsable qui n’accepte que les bons commentaires, et efface le commentaire purement et simplement avec une page blanche vierge collée dessus. Expliquer votre position de client est impensable, la responsable prend la peine d’imprimer votre dossier de réservation et de surligner au marqueur tous les points qui la protège, bien comprendre que vous avez tort parce que ... VOUS DEVEZ LIRE !!!! Cerise sur le gâteau, lors du règlement, en espèces, il y a oubli de vous remettre la facture, que faut-il en penser ?  Etablissement situé en plein centre-ville, un vrai produit 4* étoiles, en position de force car le seul sur la place et ayant été, aux dires du personnel, victime d’indélicatesses récurrentes et conséquentes de la part de leurs clients, applique une politique anti commerciale drastique. La devise à « Le RexHotel » est la suivante : « Passez à la caisse selon les règles de la maison et tout se passera bien ». Conclusion Produit 5/5 -Service 0/0. A bon entendeur salut.

reviews.positive_text: L'hôtel est très bien situé, au centre de Tarbes. Les couloirs et les chambres sont très calmes. La salle de bains est étonnante, avec ses parois de verre. Le lit est très confortable. Et le plateau de courtoisie (avec thé et café) est le bienvenu.

reviews.positive_text:
L'accueil est agréable et efficace.
L'élégance, la décoration moderne, le design de certains meubles, les volumes ... tout est fait pour bien s'y sentir.
Garage, en sous-sol de l'hôtel, 10 € la nuit, propre et très pratique.
La salle du petit-déjeuner, qui est copieux, est spacieuse.. L'accueil y est souriant et dynamique.
Des friandises attendent sur le lit.
La chambre est superbe, beaux volumes, décoration soignée, très grande baie vitrée qui donne sur la rue que l'on entend pas.
Grande salle de bain au coeur de la chambre, avec douche et baignoire, entièrement entourée de baies vitrées.
A deux pas d'une place où de nombreux restaurants nous tendent les bras.
L'ambiance lumineuse des couloirs.
reviews.negative_text: Nous avons entendu des bruits au-dessus de nos têtes.le soir et le matin tôt. Insonorisation ?

Cet hôtel est très bien situé dans le centre de Tarbes. 
Chambres spacieuses et confortables.
Le personnel est accueillant et très serviable. J'ai pu laisser mon bagage en sécurité dans une pièce réservée après le check out pendant toute la journée, mon train ne partant que le soir. 
Je recommande vivement cet hôtel sans hésitation!

The entrance to the garage for the car was incredibly narrow - very scary entering and exiting but help was sent. Very dead atmosphere in the hotel.

reviews.positive_text: The room was a comfortable size with a private outdoor area. Smelt clean as you walked in. The bed was very comfortable and felt clean.

reviews.positive_text: A good stop close to Lourdes. More lively town with hotel being at the centre.

reviews.positive_text: Very comfortable
Quite a large room. Very quiet despite the street traffic outside. Great position to visit Tarbes on foot. Quiet hotel too. No disturbances from other guests or rooms.
reviews.negative_text:
The bathroom needs a complete overall. For a 4-star hotel, the shower next to the bath with a sliding glass door that is not waterproof spills water all over the place. The tap/shower combination in the bath didn't work.
The breakfast was OK, but nothing special for a place of this caliber. The staff was polite, but no more.
The parking is horrendous. It's like trying to ride through some kind of intestine. Not made for today's cars, especially SUV's. The street parking was a better choice at 1€ / hour

reviews.review_title: Well appointed hotel, great staff, and in a good location.
reviews.positive_text: Nice large room, room service and the lobby bar were quite good.
The location couldn't have been better, right in the centre. The room was clean and air con worked well as it was very hot outside. The bed was huge.
reviews.negative_text: It was very expensive. The lift was broken on one day so had to walk up/down 6 flights but the was fixed by the evening.

reviews.review_title: A comfortable room in the centre of town
reviews.positive_text: A very large comfortable King size bed
lovely and clean, good access to city centre
reviews.negative_text: There was no parking, the under ground car park was full, had to park on the street costing €5-8 a day, Not the place if you need to ha be a car with you, Breakfast €20 pp pd high for what was on offer.

reviews.positive_text: Great rooms large tubs good terrace.

reviews.positive_text:
Very nice room modern bathroom
Solid breakfast
reviews.negative_text:
Staff felt young inexperienced.

We asked information about parking. They told us it was 15€ a day.
We asked a local for a free parking. The underground parking at exactly 20 meters from the hotel was free. Yet somehow.. They didn't mention that.
Not cool.

reviews.review_title: Treat yourself to a luxurious stay in Tarbes!
reviews.positive_text: Refreshingly modern, sleek design; large spacious room with luxury fittings (great to have a kettle and mini fridge in the room!). In short, the facilities, the exceptionally friendly and helpful staff, and the central location make Le Rex the perfect choice for a stay in Tarbes!
Friendly clean excellent location …. Helpful staff

reviews.positive_text: Comfortable hotel near good restaurants. The rooms were very spacious. The breakfast was excellent - lots of options including hot food. The staff were very friendly and helpful.  Tarbes was a great location for exploring the Pyrenees.
reviews.negative_text: The bed was too hard but very large - extra large king.

reviews.positive_text: We booked a suite, which was very roomy and comfortable.  It was quiet at night and dark, so conducive for sleep.  We purchased the breakfast.  It was plentiful with good variety.  Convenient parking below the hotel.

reviews.positive_text:
Very posh hotel and looked a high standard everywhere. 
Room was very comfortable with free water and huge bath .
reviews.negative_text: No restaurant and they advertise a shuttle service from the airport . However they just give you a local taxi number .

reviews.positive_text: Friendly welcome, clean rooms, great location

reviews.review_title: Spacious, clean and very comfortable. Good underground parking!
reviews.positive_text: Quality of accommodation is excellent, spacious and modern in style. The breakfast is very generous with full cooked (English style) choices    and priced very competitively.
reviews.negative_text: For a four star hotel we were disappointed there was no restaurant but as the hotel is located in the centre of town we found many restaurants within short walking distance. We enjoyed a great Chinese!

reviews.review_title: If you need to be in Tarbes this hotel is the best and I will definitely book every year now.
reviews.positive_text:
The rooms were big comfortable with an extra large bed that was fantastic. 
The power shower was excellent way to start the day. Highly recommend the hotel.
reviews.negative_text:
You had to park a distance from the Hotel on paid meters. 
The cost of parking was very cheaper and I would recommend you download the app as easier. 
The hotel was totally dead at night around the bar area.

reviews.positive_text: room was nice, stuff very friendly
reviews.negative_text: having a SPA

reviews.review_title: The only hotel that we would return to
reviews.positive_text: Absolutely stylistically beautiful
reviews.negative_text: Nothing

reviews.review_title: Very good modern hotel in Tarbes city centre
reviews.positive_text: The hotel is modern, located in the centre of Tarbes, at walking distance from all attractions, restaurants and bars. The room I stayed was clean and comfortable. The ratio quality/price is good for such a kind of hotel.
Friendly central clean

reviews.review_title: Really lovely stay, and a fabulous stay.
reviews.positive_text: Jeremy and the entire staff were amazingly helpful. The hotel was beautifully decorated, and wonderfully central.
Modern, clean, good location, good parking (basement with internal access), very quiet. Staff we all excellent.
reviews.negative_text: Room layout is unusual, with wardrobe in the lounge (should be in the bedroom) and then TV in the bedroom (would be better in the lounge). Makes the lounge a little bit of a waste. Glass bathroom is also unusual as it faces the lounge. A modern design that doesn’t really work very well to be honest.

reviews.positive_text: Excellent location, room and staff.
The hotel is very nice, with confortable beds, and nice furniture.
reviews.negative_text: PARKING - we booked a room, in a hotel with parking - when we arrived at 23:30, we were informed that the parking in the hotel was full. They offerred us to park in a public parking- this is not optimal, when you are travelling, with full car - including our bikes- We would have appreciated to know that the parking is not guaranteed.
Vegan food; not too many options.

reviews.review_title: Modern hotel, very comfortable, great location and staff.
reviews.positive_text: Spacious room and bathroom. Location was excellent. Staff very helpful.
Room staff
The design, the leisure room.

reviews.review_title: Wonderful modern hotel in the middle of town.
reviews.positive_text:
This is a very stylish modern hotel in a busy district. Near plenty of restaurants and cafes, middle of town.
Room was quite large with a glassed-in bathroom. Friendly staff. Nice bar. High-quality place.

The breakfast was OK for what the normal hotels in the area are offering. The coffee was quite good, not perfect but good for what you can get in the are. There were several things one could choose at the breakfast so, in general, it was OK. The staff in the restaurant was also nice, polite and pleasant. Of course, everything spotless.

The gym was a pleasant suprise. I found newer and better sport devices. It is a pity that the room is small. However, this is a plus! Well done!

A special remark for the rooms: they look excellent. The layout and the design of the room with the glass walls bathroom and the shower next to the bathtub is very pleasant. The architect did a good job. THe rooms look special, in the good way
reviews.negative_text:
Hard to say. the gym could have been bigger, but the fact that there were newer and better devices is compensating.
I wouldnt say i didn't like but it's a pitty that the hotel doesnt have a spa/ sauna/ relaxation area, This would make the hotel unbeatable.
Ok: one thing could be improved, the ceiling shower gives you some cold drops on your head when you use the hand shower :)

reviews.positive_text: Breakfast was good if a little on the pricey side
reviews.negative_text: The bedroom was too hot. I was unable to alter the temperature. It was like the control did not actually control anything.

reviews.positive_text: Always well received by friendly staff.

reviews.review_title: Perfectly located and friendly staff as a bonus
reviews.positive_text:
Very friendly and helpful staff. I had communicated with the property through the chat function and they replied immediately.
The room was clean and quiet. Very comfortable bed. Cozy atmosphere.
Great location. Did not have time for breakfast. Staff were very helpful and friendly. Clean and very comfortable

reviews.positive_text: Muy buena ubicación en el pueblo de Tarbes. Cumplió nuestro objetivo que era hacer una parada en un lugar intermedio de nuestro viaje en coche. Camas cómodas. Muy limpio. Parking muy reducido. Desayuno correcto.

reviews.review_title: Hotel nou, modern i espaios amb la voluntat de ser el millor hotel de Tarbes
reviews.positive_text:
La disposicio de l'habitacio, amplitut, la molt bona decoracio i aprofitament del espais. Tot ple de detalls.
Pel que fa al espais generals tambe molt bon gust en la decoracio
reviews.negative_text: L'esmorzar una mica fluix en relacio a tot el demes.

reviews.positive_text: Stanza molto spaziosa e hotel ben posizionato.
reviews.negative_text: Colazione un po' troppo cara ma per fortuna la posizione permette di risolvere diversamente

reviews.positive_text: Posizione centralissima, personale cortese e professionale. Camera prestige di ampia metratura,  dotata di un sala da bagno e di un servizio toilette a parte. Sistemazione comoda e confortevole.
reviews.negative_text: Unico neo mancanza di un aereatore nel servizio toilette

reviews.positive_text: HABITACION PERFECTA Y GARAJE MUY BUENO
esmorzar més que correcte. Personal excel·lent

reviews.review_title: Tolles Hotel mit guter Ausstattung und ausgezeichneter Lage im Stadtzentrum.
reviews.positive_text: Parken im Hotel ist für größere Autos sehr beengt, das Bett war sehr groß und breit mit bequemer Polsterung, das Frühstück sehr umfangreich und vielfältig, es wurde ständig nachgefüllt. Das Zimmer war groß und gut für mehrere Tage Aufenthalt ausgestattet. Die Klimaanlage musste von der Rezeption gestartet werden. Das Bad war sehr groß und mit Badewanne und extra Dusche ausgestattet.
reviews.negative_text: Das Bad hätte ein Bidet verdient.

reviews.positive_text: Heerlijk groot bed
Hotel moderno e centrale. Camera spaziosa e di design
Letto formidabile mai dormito così bene. Molto pulito, personale gentile e ottima posizione.
Accoglienza servizio posizione

reviews.positive_text: Diseño, limpieza, ubicación, comodidad de las camas

reviews.review_title: Gutes Hotel im Zentrum von Tarbes
reviews.positive_text: Unser Zimmer war in dem modernen Business-Hotel sehr gut ausgestattet. Hervorzuheben sind die breiten und sehr bequemen Betten. Das Personal war sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Wir konnten unser Auto in der Tiefgarage parken.
El tracte del personal, l'arquitectura de l'hotel i la ubicació
El buen gusto en la decoración, comodidad de la cama y la ubicación.
Nos encantó la amplitud y diseño de la habitación. El personal de recepción es muy agradable, atento y servicial.
reviews.negative_text: Nada, todo muy bien.
